title: LF 2 more people for ranked 5s. WE SMURFING
body:
https://discord.gg/va4EBbE

Join discord. to play. LF 2 . ANY ROLES!

replies.body: http://themovieblog.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/smurfset-01.jpg GARGARRARGAHMEL FDTFR6EGD6EDS I've been playing for so long but never made a smurf except for that one time that I got banned for 3 days over raging and having to afk a lot during a busy week. Smurts are starting to feel like little trolls...I still like whooping braggers claiming to be smurfs though <.< Like some of them want to say/do stuff that they can't on their main/mains lol. That are reportable>.< I don't like Gargamel but LoL smurfs aren't smurfs.
